title: Un Domenica d'Agosto = A Sunday in August
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Class consciousness
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Italy - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Italy - Description and travel
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Italy - Social conditions
description: A comedy-drama exploring the diverse social stratas in 1950s Italy as an unrelated group of people travel to Ostia Beach to escape Rome's heat. During the course of the day their relationships are observed and their aspirations and destinies gradually revealed. Made on location in a Neo-Realist vein, using a partly amateur cast.  Credits: Producer, Sergio Amidei ; director, Luciano Emmer ; writer, Franco Brusati, Luciano Emmer, Cesare Zavattini, Giulio Macchi ; photography, Domenica Scala, Leonida Barboni, Ubaldo Marelli ; editing, Jolanda Benvenuti ; music, Roman Vlad. Cast: Anna Baldini, Franco Interlenghi, Marcello Mastroianni, Elvy Lissia, Massimo Serato, Correda Verga, Ave Ninchi.
